name: InstabilityVerse
description:
Welcome to Instability Verse - Where Entropy is at its finest. 

Protect and upgrade each platform you build and don't forget about your HomeBase! Reach a high level of instability and all your work is going to end very fast.

Keep your eyes on the instability of your constructions otherwise you'll lose a lot of productivity in a matter of seconds. 

P.S.

Unfortunately, I couldn't integrate all the features that I had in mind, but well... the time wasn't in my favor, haha. 

Have fun
